citations.title: [1] [A Comparative Study of YOLOv8 to YOLOv11 Performance in Underwater Vision Tasks](
[2] [From underwater to aerial: a novel multi-scale knowledge distillation approach for coral reef monitoring](
[3] [Deep learning for automated coral reef monitoring: a novel system based on YOLOv8 detection and DeepSORT tracking](
[4] [Automatic Coral Detection with YOLO: A Deep Learning Approach](
[5] [Efficient underwater ecological monitoring with embedded AI: detecting Crown-of-Thorns Starfish via DCGAN and YOLOv6](
[6] [Broadscale reconnaissance of coral reefs from citizen science and deep learning](
[7] [Citizen science benefits coral reefs and community members alike](
[8] [Detection of Coral Reef Bleaching Based on Sentinel-2 Multi-Temporal Imagery](
